sentences.en: a lonely trek through the forest
a swap meet for collectors of Star Trek memorabilia
sentences.cn: 《星际迷航》纪念品收藏者交流会

sentences.en: Before the burial , there was a long trek by donkey or mule.
sentences.cn: 经过驴骡的长途驮运,才到达埋藏地点.

sentences.en: Berel Jestrow numbly surmises that the trek may soon be ending.
sentences.cn: 贝雷尔·杰斯特罗麻木地猜想这场长途跋涉很快就要结束了.

sentences.en: By breeding mice with an absence of TREK - 1 , researchers were able create a depression - resistant strain.
sentences.cn: 通过饲养缺乏TREK -1 基因的小鼠, 研究人员能建立对抗抑郁症的小鼠品系.

sentences.en: Giant still contract manufactures for brands such as Trek and Scott.
sentences.cn: 目前,巨大也仍接受崔克(Trek)、Scott等品牌的制造合同.

sentences.en: He is on a trek through the South Gobi desert.
sentences.cn: 他正徒步穿越南戈壁沙漠。

sentences.en: It was a long trek, and Jack and I both started to get cranky after about ten minutes.
sentences.cn: 那是一次长途跋涉，我和杰克走了约10分钟便开始烦躁不安起来。

sentences.en: It's a long trek into town.
sentences.cn: 到商业区去要走很长的路。

sentences.en: Joyce Bryt is a devoted Star Trek fan.
sentences.cn: 乔伊丝·布赖特是《星际迷航》的狂热粉丝。

sentences.en: Most of the trek is along worn paths.
sentences.cn: 大部分时候都是沿着被人踩得坑坑洼洼的小路跋涉。

sentences.en: My boots were punished by our long trek in the mountains.
sentences.cn: 我的靴子因为我们在山中漫长的徒步行走而受损.

sentences.en: The Dutchman was six - foot, a great , red - faced, hot - tempered trek - ox of a man.
sentences.cn: 那荷兰人身高六英尺, 大块头, 红脸膛, 暴脾气,简直是一头拉车的公牛.

sentences.en: The trek across the desert will test my strength and will.
sentences.cn: 穿越沙漠的艰难旅程将考验我的意志和力量.

sentences.en: The World Trade Centre is a bit of a trek from Soho, but it's worth it.
sentences.cn: 从苏豪区到世贸中心走起来是有点远，但还是值得的。

sentences.en: We often go pony - trek in the summer.
sentences.cn: 夏季我们经常骑马旅行.

trans.tran_cn: 长途跋涉，艰难的旅程，远距离行走
trans.tran_en: a long and difficult journey, made especially on foot as an adventure
a long and difficult journey, made especially on foot as an adventure

trans.tran_cn: 长途跋涉，拖着腿走，徒步旅行，（牛）拉货车
trans.tran_en: to make a long and difficult journey, especially on foot
